last_episode_to_air.name: End Game
last_episode_to_air.overview: With a near fatality, tensions are high as Gouken is forced to make the hardest decision of his life as an outside force draws closer. The Dojo will never be the same again...

name: Street Fighter: Assassin's Fist
overview: A multi-layered series that looks back to the formative years of Ryu and Ken as they live a traditional warrior's life in secluded Japan.

episodes.name: Beginnings
episodes.overview: As Ryu and Ken near the end of their training they are impatient to master the power of 'Hado'. Their Master, Goken, worries about sharing this powerful technique. Goken sets Ryu and Ken on a quest to find Gotetsu's Dojo where he trained.

episodes.name: Round 1: Fight!
episodes.overview: At Goutetsu's Dojo Gouken, Ryu and Ken pay homage at Goutetsu's grave. Ken and Ryu discover something secret in Gouken's past. Gouken recalls his own time spent training alongside his brother Gouki under their Master Goutetsu. Ryu and Ken fight!

episodes.name: Satsui No Hado
episodes.overview: In the past, Goutetsu instructs the young Gouken and Gouki. Gouki is drawn to the power of 'Satsui no Hado'. In the present, Ryu and Ken try to create their first Hadouken. Gouken is disturbed by Ken's approach and they argue. Ryu and Ken learn more about the history of Ansatsuken, their master Gouken and his dead brother Gouki.

episodes.name: A Rough Night
episodes.overview: Ryu is disturbed and sees a foreboding stranger in his nightmares. Ryu and Ken sneak out for adventure at the G.I. Bar. Ken's father makes a surprise visit. Ryu is unsettled by the old Dojo.

episodes.name: Banished
episodes.overview: Gouken and Gouki vie for Sayaka's attention. Gouki uses 'Satsui no Hado' in a sparring match almost killing his opponent. Goutetsu gives Gouki an Ultimatum after his abuse of Satsui no Hado. Gouki and Sayaka part.

episodes.name: Demons Within
episodes.overview: Ryu and Ken continue to work on their Hadouken, but Ryu is troubled and refuses to fully manifest his. Something is learnt of Ryu's past. A mysterious stranger appears to Gouken.

episodes.name: Path of the Shin Oni
episodes.overview: In the past, we see events from Gouki's perspective as he finds a new home. Gouken and Sayaka become estranged.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Gouki's fatalistic pursuit of Dark 'Hado' takes him to new dangerous levels. Goutetsu & Gouken seriously debate the risks vs benefit of 'Satsui no Hado'.

episodes.name: The Calm Before The Storm
episodes.overview: Goutetsu and Gouken consult the Ansatsuken scrolls and discuss Gouki's departure. They question the very real potential of Ansatsuken myths becoming reality. Goutetsu confronts a dark presence.

episodes.name: The Raging Demon
episodes.overview: More is learnt of the fate of Goutetsu, Gouki and Sayaka. Ryu and Ken train, their techniques and Hadoken become more advanced.

episodes.name: May The Best Man Win
episodes.overview: As Ryu and Ken' training approaches a climax, Gouken sets them a 'rite of passage' which will culminate in the greatest challenge of their lives.

episodes.name: End Game
episodes.overview: With a near fatality, tensions are high as Gouken is forced to make the hardest decision of his life as an outside force draws closer. The Dojo will never be the same again...
